spec_data.Name: rubygem-timecop
spec_data.Description:
A gem providing "time travel" and "time freezing" capabilities, making it dead
simple to test time-dependent code.  It provides a unified method to mock
Time.now, Date.today, and DateTime.now in a single call.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:37:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides a unified method to mock Time.now, Date.today in a single call
